about_the_game:
Craft Carnage: Unleash the Ultimate Survival Experience!

Survival has never been this intense, this immersive, or this brutal. Craft Carnage brings together the heart-pounding intensity of Escape from Tarkov and the sandbox creativity of Rust, delivering a gaming experience that's nothing short of extraordinary.

Craft Carnage is where survival meets strategy, where chaos meets creativity. How will you navigate this relentless realm? Will you emerge as a lone wolf, a skilled trader, or a leader of a thriving community? The choices are yours to make, and the consequences are yours to face.

Are you ready to embark on the ultimate survival adventure? Craft Carnage awaits. Gather your gear, forge your destiny, and conquer the carnage.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game, Craft Carnage, contains mature content that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players can expect to encounter elements such as intense violence, graphic depictions, and strong language throughout the game. We recommend that customers review the game's age rating and read user reviews to make an informed decision about whether Craft Carnage aligns with their preferences and is appropriate for their age group.

name: Craft Carnage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
